basics.name: Matteo Biagetti
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: After working for several years in theoretical cosmology, I’ve recently moved towards data-oriented research. I am interested in the topological and geometric structure underlying high dimensional data from various datasets, ranging from cosmological datasets to representations in biological and artificial neural networks.

work.summary: Research in topological data analysis, machine learning, and data management. Scientific manager of FAIR-by-design project.
